name: What Lies Between (itch)
description:
Travel through a new world by chaining dashes together! 

What Lies Between is an adventure platformer set in a new universe, Can you make it back to where your from? Use all the tools picked up along the journey to navigate, from jumps to multidirectional dashes. 


Trailer:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IovrLav2d-c
